meanings.definition: Covering a surface with a pattern of repeated shapes
meanings.sent1: The tessellated floor had squares and triangles all over it.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a tessellated design using different colored tiles.
meanings.sent3: The tessellated wall looked like a giant puzzle completed by a giant.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a tessellated map of memories, each fitting perfectly into place.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a tessellated wonderland of flowers and bushes, each in its designated spot.

meanings.definition: Fitting together without any gaps or overlaps
meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces were tessellated perfectly, leaving no gaps between them.
meanings.sent2: The roof tiles were tessellated so well that rain couldn't seep through.
meanings.sent3: The tessellated jigsaw puzzle was so seamless, it seemed to solve itself.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a tessellated bond, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The tessellated pattern of the quilt ensured warmth without any cold spots.

meanings.sent1: The tessellated glass windows in the church created a beautiful play of light.

meanings.sent3: The tessellated pattern on the dress made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a tessellated silhouette against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The tessellated pattern on the floor resembled a vibrant patchwork quilt.
